recipes.name: Mole
recipes.description: A rich and complex Mexican sauce made with chili peppers, spices, chocolate, and nuts.

recipes.name: Tacos al Pastor
recipes.description: Marinated pork cooked on a vertical spit and served in corn tortillas with pineapple.

recipes.name: Chiles Rellenos
recipes.description: Poblano peppers stuffed with cheese or meat, battered and fried.

recipes.name: Pozole
recipes.description: A traditional hominy soup made with pork or chicken and red chili broth.

recipes.name: Tamales
recipes.description: Corn dough filled with meats, cheese, or chilies, wrapped in corn husks and steamed.

recipes.name: Enchiladas
recipes.description: Corn tortillas rolled around a filling and covered with chili sauce.

recipes.name: Guacamole
recipes.description: A fresh avocado dip mixed with lime juice, onion, tomato, and cilantro.

recipes.name: Quesadillas
recipes.description: Tortillas filled with melted cheese and sometimes meat or vegetables.

recipes.name: Sopes
recipes.description: Thick corn tortillas topped with beans, meat, lettuce, cheese, and salsa.

recipes.name: Tostadas
recipes.description: Crispy fried tortillas topped with beans, meat, lettuce, and crema.
